name: Light Cavalry
description: The Light Cavalry wears leather armor and carries a shield, skilled in mounted combat with a Cavalry Saber and a Shortbow.
memorable: Specializes in melee attacks against smaller foes with a powerful area attack through Fire Breath.
goals: Engage in battles effectively while mounted, taking down smaller opponents.
relations: Can be found fighting alongside other cavalry or humanoid warriors.
environment: Typically found on battlefields or in areas where mounted combat is prevalent.
strengths: Advantage on melee attacks against smaller creatures when mounted, strong physical capabilities.
weaknesses: Lower intelligence and charisma scores hinder problem-solving and social interactions.
attacks: Utilizes a Cavalry Saber for slashing damage and a Shortbow for piercing damage, includes a fire breath area attack.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, dealing significant area damage in a cone.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 14, showing good awareness of surroundings.
skills: Adept in athletics and perception with +4 bonuses in both skills.
additional_information: Resistance to fire damage increases resilience in combat.
Mounted Warrior ability prevents the mount from being charmed or frightened.
Infantry Slayer ability enhances melee effectiveness against smaller foes.
